alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 10:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...An area of moderate to locally heavy rain will affect the highway 50 corridor between Rocky Ford and Las Animas through 1100 PM MDT... At 1021 PM MDT, Doppler radar was indicating an area of moderate to occasionally heavy rain occurring along the highway 50 corridor from Rocky Ford to Las Animas. Ponding of water on highway 50 is likely occurring, and high water may be possible at underpasses along the highway 50 corridor. HAZARD...locally heavy rains. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...ponding of water along highway 50 from Rocky Ford to Las Animas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
